metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15437 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
The Linux kernel before version 5.8 is vulnerable to a NULL pointerdereference indrivers/tty/serial/8250/8250_core.c:serial8250_isa_init_ports() that allowslocal users to cause a denial of service by using the p->serial_in pointerwhich uninitialized.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15437` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-45-generic - 5.4.0-45.49
linux-image-5.4.0-45-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-45.49
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-45-generic - 5.4.0-45.49
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-45-lowlatency - 5.4.0-45.49
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1021-kvm - 5.4.0-1021.21
No subscription required
